pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, February 12, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Dakar, Senegal

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Gorée Island.

Gorée Island

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of Senegal, Macky Sall,

Music Room, Ground Floor
Presidential Palace

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the President of Senegal, Macky Sall.

Banquet Room, Ground Floor
Presidential Palace

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an official luncheon given by the President of Senegal, Macky Sall.

Esplanade, Garden
Presidential Palace

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an official opening of the International Development Research Centre’s regional office.

International Development Research Centre Regional Office
Immeuble 2K Plaza, Route des Almadies

Note for media:

  • Open coverage of the ribbon cutting

3:07 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a projects exhibition and attend a reception for the official opening of the International Development Research Centre's regional office, where he will deliver remarks.

South Terrace
Palms Hotel

Note for media:

  • Open coverage of remarks

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the 2022 Dakar Youth Olympic Games sporting event.

Corniche Basketball Court
Route de la Corniche Ouest

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

8:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a reception given by the Ambassador of Canada to Senegal, Sébastien Beaulieu, and will deliver remarks.

Garden
Official Residence

Note for media:

  • Open coverage of remarks
